skillTree.localised_description: A gift to Wurrzag from the Iron Pig tribe, Spleenrippa is his dependable, and terrifying, War Boar mount.

effects.description: Mount: Spleenrippa

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Fighting Wurrzag is relatively disconcerting. His feet stamp out the wild of rhythm of the Savage Orcs as he jigs in and out of the fight.

factionEffects.localised_description: Wurrzag’s power and influence are beyond question. Those that know his abilities obey; those who do not, suffer. His retinue of Savage Orcs has vowed to stand by ‘Da Great Green Prophet’ to the end, and their strength has inspired countless other Greenskins to war in their turn.
